feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:25 p.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 2:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and snow squalls ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
